Plot: A year after disposing the body of a man they accidently killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.
Title: Scary Movie
Writer: Shawn Wayans, Marlon Wayans, Buddy Johnson, Phil Beauman, Jason Friedberg, Aaron Seltzer
Actors: Carmen Electra, Dave Sheridan, Frank B. Moore, Giacomo Baessato
tomatoConsensus: Critics say Scary Movie overloads on crudity and grossness to get its laughs.
